title: Toluca Cathedral
description: A historic cathedral located in the heart of Toluca.

title: Nevado de Toluca
address: Parque Nacional Nevado de Toluca, Mexico
description: A stunning extinct volcano and popular hiking destination.

title: Cosmovitral Botanical Garden
address: Av. Lerdo de Tejada, Centro, Toluca, Mexico
description: Famous for its stained glass murals and lush botanical exhibits.

title: Zoológico de Zacango
address: Calzada al Zoológico s/n, Calimaya, Mexico
description: One of Mexico’s largest zoos, home to exotic and native species.

title: Museo de Bellas Artes
description: An art museum featuring colonial and modern Mexican works.

title: Plaza de los Mártires
description: A historic public square surrounded by important government buildings.

title: Calixtlahuaca Archaeological Zone
description: An ancient Matlatzinca site with a circular temple to the wind god Ehecatl.

title: La Marquesa National Park
description: A scenic forested area great for outdoor activities like ATV riding and hiking.
